txt.en: Glórellas is in the Court of Celeborn.
Daily Request: Food, Water, and Words
Give hopeful words to melancholy Elf-warriors in Udûn ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
'DNT - Blah!'

'My people may seem strange to you, [placeholder]. The currents of the world do not affect us as outwardly as they do you, but I assure you we feel the same hurts as others of the Free People.

'I give to you these packages, and ask you to deliver them to Elf-warriors who adventure in Udûn on behalf of Lord Celeborn. You ask what is contained within? Some contain wrappings of lembas, and others skins of clean water; some contain short messages from folk of the Golden Wood, encouraging their friends to go on with their tasks. In this way you will deliver food, water, and words of hope to those who need them, and aid the cause of the Elves that must adventure in the Black Land.

'Look for Elf-warriors who have need of these gifts in Udûn, on the road that climbs to Anglach.'
'I was filled with sorrow, but with these tidings I can go on. Thank you.'
'My mind is turned in a happier direction. I will go on!'
'These tidings are just what I needed to bolster my mind. I thank you!'
DNT - Blah!
'My heart is lightened by your gift! I can go on.'
'I needed nothing more than this. Thank you, my friend.'
Gave lembas to hungry Elf-warriors ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
DNT - Blah!
Gave water-skins to thirsty Elf-warriors ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
DNT - Blah!
Glórellas gave you a number of packages to give to Elf-warriors on the road to Anglach, in Udûn.
'This will help with my growing thirst. I am grateful.'
'Thank you for bringing food, water, and words of hope to the Elves that adventure in Gorgoroth.\n\n'Return on the morrow if you wish to further aid the Lord and Lady of Lothlórien.'
'My throat had become rather parched, thank you.'

'Our people must seem strange to others, [placeholder]. The currents of the world may not outwardly affect us, but you know we feel the same hurts as do others of the Free People.

'I give to you these packages, and ask you to deliver them to Elf-warriors who adventure in Udûn on behalf of Lord Celeborn. You ask what is contained within? Some contain wrappings of lembas, and others skins of clean water; some contain short messages from folk of the Golden Wood, encouraging their friends to go on with their tasks. In this way you will deliver food, water, and words of hope to those who need them, and aid the cause of the Elves that must adventure in the Black Land.

'Look for Elf-warriors who have need of these gifts in Udûn, on the road that climbs to Anglach.'
'This waterskin comes at just the right time, and I thank you for it!'
'Look for Elf-warriors who have need of these gifts in Udûn, on the road that climbs to Anglach, and give them those gifts of comfort.'
'This water is cool and clear, and most refreshing!'
'It is not easy to come by drinkable water in this dry land. This is a timely gift!'
Talk to Glórellas in the Court of Celeborn
Glórellas gave you a number of packages that should help inspire Elf-warriors in Udûn to keep adventuring.
Gave hopeful words to melancholy Elf-warriors ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Give lembas to hungry Elf-warriors in Udûn ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
'I thank you, friend.'
'This will help with my growing appetite. I thank you.'
Give water-skins to thirsty Elf-warriors in Udûn ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
'My hunger was growing acute. Thank you for the lembas!'
'Food from home! You have my thanks.'
'I could have gone some more days without food, but I am pleased to have this instead.'
'The lembas you bring is most welcome!'
